mapper.insert: insert into tum_project(pj_id, pj_reg_date, email, pj_hits) values('PJ' || LPAD(tum_project_sequ.nextval, 5, 0), sysdate, #{semail}, 0)
mapper.select: select pj_id from(select rownum rno, pj_id from (select pj_id, pj_reg_date from tum_project order by pj_reg_date desc)) where rno=1
mapper.update: update tum_project set pj_title=#{pj_title}, pj_stitle=#{pj_stitle} where pj_id=#{pj_id}
update tum_project set pro_img=#{vo.pro_img}, pro_simg=#{vo.pro_simg} where pj_id='PJ80'

update tum_project set pj_account_type=#{pj_account_type}, pj_account_id=#{pj_account_id}, pj_account_name=#{pj_account_name}, pj_bank=#{pj_bank}, pj_account_number=#{pj_account_number} where pj_id=#{pj_id}
update tum_project set pj_story=#{pj_story:VARCHAR} where pj_id=#{pj_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tum_gift values('G' || LPAD(tum_gift_sequ.nextval, 5, 0) , #{pj_id}, #{gift_title}, #{gift_price}, #{gift_sort_num}, to_date(#{gift_delivery_date}, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), #{gift_max_count}, #{gift_delivery_yn})
mapper.select: select gift_id from(select rownum rno, gift_id from (select gift_id from tum_gift order by gift_id desc)) where rno=1
select item_id from(select rownum rno, item_id from (select item_id from tum_item order by item_id desc)) where rno=1
mapper.update: update tum_item set item_check=#{item_check}, item_title=#{item_title}, item_option_type=#{item_option_type}, item_option=#{item_option}, item_count=#{item_count} where item_id=#{item_id}
update tum_project set pj_img=#{pj_img}, pj_simg=#{pj_simg} where pj_id=#{pj_id}
update tum_member set profile_img=#{profile_img}, profile_simg=#{profile_simg} where email = #{email}
mapper.select: select rownum rno, gift_id, pj_id, gift_title, gift_price, gift_sort_num, to_char(gift_delivery_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') gift_delivery_date, gift_max_count, gift_delivery_yn from(select * from tum_gift where pj_id = #{pj_id} order by gift_id desc)
select rownum rno, gift_id, item_id, item_title, item_option_type, item_option, item_count, item_check from(select * from tum_item where gift_id = #{gift_id} order by item_id)
select email, name, profile_img, profile_simg, intro from tum_member where email=#{email}
